sources.title: Moment of Indiscretion
sources.description: Title: Moment of Indiscretion Summary: Reluctant to disclose her whereabouts on the night of the murder of her one-time fiance's mistress, a married woman is accused of the murder. Directed by: Max Varnel Actors: Ronald Howard, Lana Morris, John Van Eyssen Production Company: Danziger Productions Ltd. Release Date: September 1958 (UK) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 Reluctant to disclose her whereabouts on the night of the murder of her one-time fiance's mistress, a married woman is accused of the murder.

metadata.Plot: For an innocent goodbye, the married Janet meets her one-time fiance leaving the country forever and witnesses a murder. Not wanting to report the matter to her jealous husband, a lawyer, she ends up being accused of the crime.
metadata.Actors: Ronald Howard, Lana Morris, John Van Eyssen
